item.title: Part 1 - A Beginner’s Guide to Healthy Eating (Creating a Shopping List)
item.description: Background After seeing this meme about myself I realized it might be a good time to make some lifestyle changes. I’ve always been fairly active and of a healthy weight, so I’ve never seen healthy eating as a pressing issue, but in the pursuit of perfection, I think healthy eating is a good goal to aspire to, if only as a challenge. One thing I noticed is that my biggest barrier is that I don’t know how to cook, or what to buy.
